The person who made this video is a sick bastard. Still, it would be against all TPB stands for to censor it. It's MP4. No other file. "You" be the judge if that can spread viruses. I though only executable files could do that. I personally take no side with this monster, but I want to know more of what all the children died for. And to be ready to condemn it, if need be and some idiots try to use it against me.
